channel.title: D3.js on Learning Monk Blog
channel.description: Recent content in D3.js on Learning Monk Blog

item.title: Analyzing suicide rates with D3.js
item.description: In this article, I am going to create a simple Stacked bar chart using D3.js (a Javascript library for data visualization) to understand suicide rates by Region and Gender for the period 1985-2016. Here is the link to the dataset. You might ask me, why use D3.js for creating such simple charts, as much easier tools are available. You are right. D3.js is an overkill for such a simple chart. But, the reason behind using D3.
